name: 兔耳冒险谭/Usamimi Adventure
description: 說這個可能有點突然，但世界即將要毀滅了！從下水井裏被召喚到了異世界的你，邂逅了可愛嬌柔的兔耳精靈海阪。海阪邀請你與她一起拯救世界。可這個世界因為“惡意”被抽離，大家都沒有戰鬥的概念。這要如何拯救世界呢？？？答案居然是——————猜謎！！！...
minimum_requirements: İşletim Sistemi: Windows® 7/8/8.1/10 İşlemci: Intel Core i Processor Series Bellek: 1 GB RAM Ekran Kartı: HD Graphics 620 Depolama: 2 GB kullanılabilir alan İlave Notlar: Keyboard is necessary in a battle
recommended_requirements: Önerilen: İşletim Sistemi: Windows® 7/8/8.1/10 İşlemci: Intel Core i Processor Series Bellek: 2 GB RAM Ekran Kartı: HD Graphics 620 Depolama: 2 GB kullanılabilir alan İlave Notlar: Keyboard is necessary in a battle
